ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(widget): widget.Entity["LOCALPAGAMENTO"].SetString("Pagável em qualquer banco até o vencimento.") widget.Entity["MOEDA"].SetString("2") widget.Entity["ACRESCIMOS"].SetString("0,00") widget.Entity["UTILIZARENDCOBRANCA"].Visible = False widget.Entity["PUBLICARBOLWEB"].Visible = False widget.View.FieldDefinitions["SELECIONADOS"].Visible = False
